data.title: Morgan Freeman: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Morgan Freeman: Check out the list of all Morgan Freeman movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Morgan Freeman news on Times of India.
data.text:
'He's 87' trending after Morgan Freeman's new video goes viral. Watch

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jun 21, 2024, 18:36 (IST)

A video of Morgan Freeman went viral with his fans gushing about how the actor manages to look so high spirited even at the age of 87. The viral post expressed concerns over Morgan Freeman's health and the actor was wearing a glove on his left hand. Replies to the viral post informed the creator of the post that Morgan Freeman uses a compression glove because of fibromyalgia which was a result of his massive accident in 2008.

Nicole Kidman refuses stepping into director's shoes despite triumphs as producer

ANI / Apr 29, 2024, 18:00 (IST)

Renowned producer Nicole Kidman, honored with the AFI Life Achievement Award, expressed her gratitude for her directing collaborators while making it clear that directing isn't her forte due to her abundance of ideas. Kidman, known for projects like 'Big Little Lies,' values producing, highlighting her passion for supporting diverse voices through her company Blossom Films. At the AFI event, Kidman emphasized her commitment to promoting emerging talent, pledging to continue providing a platform for original voices in the industry. Despite accolades and a star-studded tribute attended by industry luminaries, Kidman remained humble, expressing her love for acting and willingness to accept any recognition with gratitude. Reflecting on her achievement, Kidman remarked, "I'll take whatever you give me," showing her dedication to the craft of storytelling and her supportive stance towards fellow creatives.

George Clooney teases fans with the possibility of returning to 'Ocean's Eleven' and unveils exciting future franchise plan

etimes.in / Dec 18, 2023, 11:29 (IST)

While confirming the existence of a strong script, Clooney hinted that the new installment might have a different flavor compared to the original trilogy, suggesting it won't follow the pattern of an Oceanâ€™s 14. He mentioned that the concept is somewhat akin to the movie Going In Style, a 1979 film that was remade in 2017, featuring Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine, and Alan Arkin. In Going In Style, lifelong friends come out of retirement to embark on another heist job

Actor Richard Roundtree was diagnosed with breast cancer, a rare occurrence among males

etimes.in / Oct 28, 2023, 00:00 (IST)

Richard Arnold Roundtree, known for his roles in movies like Shaft and Earthquake, was diagnosed with breast cancer. He discovered a lump under his left nipple while showering in 1993. Having previously experienced gynecomastia as a child, he initially dismissed the lump. However, he later learned that gynecomastia increases the risk of breast cancer in males. Roundtree underwent six months of chemotherapy and became an advocate for male breast cancer awareness. Male breast cancer is rare, accounting for less than 1% of all cases. Symptoms include lumps, changes in breast size, and nipple abnormalities.

Sally Field to receive SAG lifetime achievement award

AP / Jan 18, 2023, 08:06 (IST)

Sally Field will be honored at the 29th Screen Actors Guild Awards with the SAG lifetime achievement award. The actors guild announced Tuesday that Field will be the 58th recipient of the tribute award, following recent honorees including Helen Mirren, Robert De Niro, Alan Alda and Morgan Freeman.

FIFA World Cup: Qatar floors the world in stunning welcome

TNN / Nov 20, 2022, 23:56 (IST)

On Sunday, in the evening desert chill, at the gleaming, packed Al-Bayt stadium in the Al Khor town which literally means creek, by singing higher than the others, they were only reaffirming to the world that this belongs to them, that they had created it. And that, the world is welcome.
